# numericSummary()

**Instance Method**

Generates a numeric summary of the integer column’s elements.

## Declaration

```swift
func numericSummary() -> NumericSummary<Double>
```

## Summarizing a Column

- **summary()**: Generates a categorical summary of the column’s elements.
- **numericSummary()**: Generates a numeric summary of the floating-point column’s elements.

items.description: Generates a categorical summary of the column’s elements.
items.name: summary()

items.description: Generates a numeric summary of the floating-point column’s elements.
